Dialogue 1.simplified: 你从这里往前一直走,就到师大了。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你從這裡往前一直走,就到師大了。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ cóng zhèlǐ wǎng qián yīzhí zǒu, jiù dào shīdà le.
Dialogue 1.english: If you go straight from here, you will reach NTNU.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 从这个路口往右转,你可以到学校宿舍。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 從這個路口往右轉,你可以到學校宿舍。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: cóng zhège lùkǒu wǎng yòu zhuǎn, nǐ kěyǐ dào xuéxiào sùshè.
Dialogue 1.english: If you turn right at this intersection, you can reach the school dormitory.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 从学校大门往里面走十分钟,可以到语言中心。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 從學校大門往裡面走十分鐘,可以到語言中心。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: cóng xuéxiào dàmén wǎng lǐmiàn zǒu shí fēnzhōng, kěyǐ dào yǔyán zhōngxīn.
Dialogue 1.english: If you walk ten minutes from the school gate, you can reach the language center.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你不能(从这里)往前走,前面没有路了。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你不能(從這裡)往前走,前面沒有路了。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ bùnéng (cóng zhèlǐ) wǎng qián zǒu, qiánmiàn méiyǒu lù le.
Dialogue 1.english: You cannot go forward (from here), there's no road ahead.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你不可以从这个路口往左转,只可以往右转。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你不可以從這個路口往左轉,只可以往右轉。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ bù kěyǐ cóng zhège lùkǒu wǎng zuǒ zhuǎn, zhǐ kěyǐ wǎng yòu zhuǎn.
Dialogue 1.english: You cannot turn left at this intersection, you can only turn right.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 这公车不是往师大,是往火车站的。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 這公車不是往師大,是往火車站的。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: zhè gōngchē bù shì wǎng shīdà, shì wǎng huǒchē zhàn de.
Dialogue 1.english: This bus is not going to NTNU, it is going to the train station.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 白小姐笑起来很美。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 白小姐笑起來很美。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: bái xiǎojiě xiào qǐlái hěn měi.
Dialogue 1.english: Miss Bai looks very beautiful when she smiles.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 那里卖的小吃看起来很好吃。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 那裡賣的小吃看起來很好吃。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nàlǐ mài de xiǎochī kàn qǐlái hěn hǎochī.
Dialogue 1.english: The snacks sold there look very delicious.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 这个房子很小,我住起来不习惯。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 這個房子很小,我住起來不習慣。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: zhège fángzi hěn xiǎo, wǒ zhù qǐlái bù xíguàn.
Dialogue 1.english: This house is very small, I am not used to living in it.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 王先生今天的脸色看起来很不好。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 王先生今天的臉色看起來很不好。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wáng xiānshēng jīntiān de liǎnsè kàn qǐlái hěn bù hǎo.
Dialogue 1.english: Mr. Wang looks very unwell today.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 越南菜看起来很辣,吃起来不太辣。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 越南菜看起來很辣,吃起來不太辣。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: yuènán cài kàn qǐlái hěn là, chī qǐlái bù tài là.
Dialogue 1.english: Vietnamese food looks very spicy, but it is not very spicy when you eat it.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你说的事听起来不难。不过,做起来有点难。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你說的事聽起來不難。不過,做起來有點難。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ shuō de shì tīng qǐlái bù nán. bùguò, zuò qǐlái yǒudiǎn nán.
Dialogue 1.english: What you said doesn't sound difficult. However, it's a bit difficult to do.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 他在门口等着你,你快去吧!
Dialogue 1.traditional: 他在門口等著你,你快去吧!
Dialogue 1.pinyin: tā zài ménkǒu děng zhe nǐ, nǐ kuài qù ba!
Dialogue 1.english: He is waiting for you at the door, you should go quickly!

Dialogue 1.simplified: 李明华拿着一杯冰咖啡。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 李明華拿著一杯冰咖啡。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: lǐ mínghuá ná zhe yī bēi bīng kāfēi.
Dialogue 1.english: Li Minghua is holding a cup of iced coffee.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 他看着我,什么也没说。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 他看著我,什麼也沒說。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: tā kàn zhe wǒ, shénme yě méi shuō.
Dialogue 1.english: He looked at me and said nothing.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你不要一直坐着,我们去运动吧!
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你不要一直坐著,我們去運動吧!
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ bù yào yīzhí zuò zhe, wǒmen qù yùndòng ba!
Dialogue 1.english: Don't just sit there, let's go exercise!

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你别带着咖啡到图书馆去,里面不能喝东西。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你別帶著咖啡到圖書館去,裡面不能喝東西。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ bié dài zhe kāfēi dào túshūguǎn qù, lǐmiàn bùnéng hē dōngxī.
Dialogue 1.english: Don't bring coffee to the library, you can't drink inside.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 夜市附近的小巷子这么多,要是我没带着地图,一定会迷路。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 夜市附近的小巷子這麼多,要是我沒帶著地圖,一定會迷路。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: yèshì fùjìn de xiǎo xiàngzi zhème duō, yàoshi wǒ méi dài zhe dìtú, yīdìng huì mílù.
Dialogue 1.english: There are so many alleys near the night market, if I don't bring a map, I will definitely get lost.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我常常一边走路,一边听歌。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我常常一邊走路,一邊聽歌。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒ chángcháng yībiān zǒulù, yībiān tīng gē.
Dialogue 1.english: I often walk while listening to music.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 那个小姐喜欢一边吃饭,一边看电视。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 那個小姐喜歡一邊吃飯,一邊看電視。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nàgè xiǎojiě xǐhuān yībiān chīfàn, yībiān kàn diànshì.
Dialogue 1.english: That lady likes to eat while watching TV.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 田中诚一常常一边逛夜市,一边照相。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 田中誠一常常一邊逛夜市,一邊照相。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: tiánzhōng chéng yī chángcháng yībiān guàng yèshì, yībiān zhàoxiàng.
Dialogue 1.english: Tian Zhongcheng often visits the night market while taking pictures.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你不可以一边骑机车,一边打电话。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你不可以一邊騎機車,一邊打電話。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ bù kěyǐ yībiān qí jīchē, yībiān dǎ diànhuà.
Dialogue 1.english: You can't ride a scooter while talking on the phone.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 请你不要一边上课,一边吃早餐。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 請你不要一邊上課,一邊吃早餐。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: qǐng nǐ bù yào yībiān shàngkè, yībiān chī zǎocān.
Dialogue 1.english: Please don't eat breakfast while attending class.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 他没一边工作,一边玩手机。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 他沒一邊工作,一邊玩手機。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: tā méi yībiān gōngzuò, yībiān wán shǒujī.
Dialogue 1.english: He didn't work while playing on his phone.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我家离学校很远。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我家離學校很遠。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒ jiā lí xuéxiào hěn yuǎn.
Dialogue 1.english: My home is far from the school.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 离火车站很近的地方,有一家(牛肉)面店的牛肉面很好吃。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 離火車站很近的地方,有一家(牛肉)麵店的牛肉麵很好吃。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: lí huǒchē zhàn hěn jìn de dìfāng, yǒu yījiā (niúròu) miàndiàn de niúròu miàn hěn hǎochī.
Dialogue 1.english: There is a beef noodle shop near the train station that has very delicious beef noodles.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你从这里往左边走,离学校不远的地方,可以看到海。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你從這裡往左邊走,離學校不遠的地方,可以看到海。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ cóng zhèlǐ wǎng zuǒbiān zǒu, lí xuéxiào bù yuǎn de dìfāng, kěyǐ kàn dào hǎi.
Dialogue 1.english: If you go left from here, you can see the sea near the school.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 银行离学校不远。你走路去应该就可以了。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 銀行離學校不遠。你走路去應該就可以了。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: yínháng lí xuéxiào bù yuǎn. nǐ zǒulù qù yīnggāi jiù kěyǐ le.
Dialogue 1.english: The bank is not far from the school. You should be able to walk there.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 花莲离台北不很远,可是到那里要花不少时间。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 花蓮離台北不很遠,可是到那裡要花不少時間。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: huālián lí táiběi bù hěn yuǎn, kěshì dào nàlǐ yào huā bù shǎo shíjiān.
Dialogue 1.english: Hualien is not very far from Taipei, but it takes a lot of time to get there.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我要找的房子,不能离夜市太近。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我要找的房子,不能離夜市太近。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒ yào zhǎo de fángzi, bùnéng lí yèshì tài jìn.
Dialogue 1.english: The house I am looking for cannot be too close to the night market.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 你从这里往前一直走,就到师大了。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 你從這裡往前一直走,就到師大了。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: nǐ cóng zhèlǐ wǎng qián yīzhí zǒu, jiù dào shīdà le.
Dialogue 2.english: If you go straight from here, you will reach NTNU.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 从这个路口往右转,你可以到学校宿舍。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 從這個路口往右轉,你可以到學校宿舍。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: cóng zhège lùkǒu wǎng yòu zhuǎn, nǐ kěyǐ dào xuéxiào sùshè.
Dialogue 2.english: If you turn right at this intersection, you can reach the school dormitory.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 从学校大门往里面走十分钟,可以到语言中心。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 從學校大門往裡面走十分鐘,可以到語言中心。

Dialogue 2.english: If you walk ten minutes from the school gate, you can reach the language center.

Dialogue 2.traditional: 你不能(從這裡)往前走,前面沒有路了。

Dialogue 2.english: You cannot go forward (from here), there's no road ahead.

Dialogue 2.traditional: 你不可以從這個路口往左轉,只可以往右轉。

Dialogue 2.english: You cannot turn left at this intersection, you can only turn right.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 这公车不是往师大,是往火车站的。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 這公車不是往師大,是往火車站的。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: zhè gōngchē bù shì wǎng shīdà, shì wǎng huǒchē zhàn de.

Dialogue 2.pinyin: nàlǐ mài de xiǎochī kàn qǐlái hěn hǎochī.

Dialogue 2.traditional: 這個房子很小,我住起來不習慣。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: zhège fángzi hěn xiǎo, wǒ zhù qǐlái bù xíguàn.

Dialogue 2.traditional: 你從這裡往左邊走,離學校不遠的地方,可以看到海。

Dialogue 2.traditional: 銀行離學校不遠。你走路去應該就可以了。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: yínháng lí xuéxiào bù yuǎn. nǐ zǒulù qù yīnggāi jiù kěyǐ le.

Dialogue 2.traditional: 花蓮離台北不很遠,可是到那裡要花不少時間。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: huālián lí táiběi bù hěn yuǎn, kěshì dào nàlǐ yào huā bù shǎo shíjiān.
Dialogue 2.english: Hualien is not very far from Taipei, but it takes a lot of time to get there.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 我要找的房子,不能离夜市太近。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 我要找的房子,不能離夜市太近。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: wǒ yào zhǎo de fángzi, bùnéng lí yèshì tài jìn.
Dialogue 2.english: The house I am looking for cannot be too close to the night market.
